Real Time Tracking

Geo-Fencing

Mark out operational territories for your vehicle and get an alarm if the vehicle operates outside the territory. Our system will notify you of every time your vehicle exits or enters your defined area of operation. That is reports on every visit, duration and on any zone breaches.

Replay historical location of your vehicleâ€™s movements and activities, and review all past events and alerts that have taken place. Be, even when you might not have been available to track real time.
gps_fixed

Basic and Advanced Reports

Get fleet activities with Pilot Ghana extensive report types and Alert that record all the vehicles operations. Report on trips, fuel usage, fleet policy violations, servicing and more; with their associated costs. Alerts are sent through SMS, Email, Phone Notification based on your preference.
You can run reports on trips, fuel usage, fleet policy violations, servicing and more. The reports are available in a range of formats including PDF, Excel, and XML.

Engine Off/ Remote Vehicle Immobilizer

Remotely shut down your vehicle in the event of a carjacking, snatching, or unauthorized usage with a simple command from your phone. The ignition system of your vehicle will remain inactive until you reactivate it from your account.

notifications_active

Event Notifications and Alerts

Get instant notifications for conditions that are triggered and feedback on your vehicle use, immediately they are triggered or violated. Alerts can be received by Email, Telegram, SMS or push notifications.

notifications_active

Driver Behaviour

Our fully-featured driver behaviour module provides you evidence into unwanted driving activities such as aggressive maneuvers, braking, speeding, driving with high RPMs - all of this leads to the wear-out of parts and emergency situations on the road. This analysis can support your business to create a greener and more streamlined fleet.

local_gas_station

Live Fuel Level Monitoring

Monitor the live fuel level and usage with an optional addition of a fuel level sensor that can check for refueling, siphoning (fuel theft), leakages and more.


You cannot control the prices of fuel but you can control your fuel consumption and ensure fuel efficiency. Pilot Ghana help you to control fuel expenses/cost by providing you fuel monitoring solution to monitor the Refilling and usage of fuel.

Teltonika FMB122

Teltonika FMB122 is an advanced GLONASS/GPS tracker with external GNSS antenna, dual-SIM, Bluetooth, multiple vehicles CAN support, crash detection, idling detection, voice calls, internal battery, and a lot more.

Bluetooth for external devices and sensor with low consumption energy

Backup battery allows to work without external power supply

Dual SIM will help significantly reduce roaming charges

Digital inputs and outputs for remote control and monitoring

External GNSS antenna expands installation options
